programme.title: Dil Ne Jise Apna Kahaa
programme.desc: A widower (Salman Khan) is unaware that the woman (Bhumika Chawla) who loves him was the recipient of his wife's heart in a transplant operation.(n)

programme.title: Tehzeeb
programme.desc: A young woman (Urmila Matondkar) carries a grudge against her mother (Shabana Azmi), a well-known singer, whom she suspects of causing her father's death.(n)

programme.title: Fareb
programme.desc: One night, Ria gets a call from the police that her husband has been found dead -- possibly murdered.(n)

programme.title: GoodBuddy Gadbadi
programme.desc: Abhishek invites two of his friends to his house in Goa. When he learns that they find his wife Tara attractive, he manipulates the situation to end his prenuptial agreement and divorce Tara.(n)

programme.title: Johny I Love You
programme.desc: Following the death of his wife, former criminal Suraj Singh takes his renamed son and moves to work in a small hillside community.(n)

programme.title: Jungle
programme.desc: A man ventures into the wilderness to save his girlfriend from a kidnapper.(n)

programme.title: Ghar Mein Ram Gali Mein Shyam
programme.desc: Women of India have accepted men the way they are, but one woman doubts her husband's character.(n)

programme.title: Josh
programme.desc: The sister (Aishwarya Rai) of a gang leader (Shahrukh Khan) falls for a member (Chandrachur Singh) of a rival group.(n)

programme.title: D-Day
programme.desc: A team goes to Karachi, Pakistan, to bring back the most wanted man in India.(n)

programme.title: Ragini MMS
programme.desc: A young couple (Raj Kumar Yadav, Kainaz Motivala) spend a romantic weekend in a house rigged with hidden cameras that record every moment of their time there.(n)

programme.title: Inteha
programme.desc: Nandini comes to stay with her step-sister, Tina. Gradually, they warm up to each other, but things turn sour when Nandini disapproves of Tina's boyfriend, Ranbir.(n)

programme.title: Wake Up India
programme.desc: A girl stages a protest against the system when cops refuse to lodge a complaint against the 75-year-old chief minister who allegedly raped her.(n)

programme.title: Ishq Click
programme.desc: Aditya, a photographer, invites Sophie to Mumbai to become a model. She achieves success in the city and falls in love with him, but is heartbroken when he, in order to boost his career, marries Ira.(n)

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: A woman's (Shilpa Shetty) wealthy parents arrange a suitable marriage for her, separating her from her impoverished true love (Sunil Shetty).(n)

programme.title: Familywala
programme.desc: Anjali arrives in India to take over her father's business. Things take a turn when Raju, a poor man, makes a fake family to woo her, and her uncle, who wants to possess her wealth, tries to kill her.(n)

programme.title: Dil Ne Jise Apna Kahaa
programme.desc: A widower (Salman Khan) is unaware that the woman (Bhumika Chawla) who loves him was the recipient of his wife's heart in a transplant operation.(n)

programme.title: 102 Not Out
programme.desc: Dattatraya Vakharia is a 102-year-old man who wants to break the record of oldest living male. There's just one problem -- he must find a way to change the sad and grumpy demeanor of his 75-year-old son.(n)

programme.title: D-Day
programme.desc: A team goes to Karachi, Pakistan, to bring back the most wanted man in India.(n)

programme.title: Gangster
programme.desc: Simran, who relocates to Seoul, is distraught when Daya, a gangster, re-enters her life. She has to make a choice between him and her lover Akash, who is a singer at an Indian restaurant.(n)

programme.title: Baat Bann Gayi
programme.desc: Kabir pretends to be a geek in order to impress his girlfriend's brother; however, his plan goes awry when his unruly look-alike enters the picture.(n)

programme.title: Nazar Ke Samne
programme.desc: When Umesh is wrongly imprisoned for murder and given a death sentence, his lawyer has one week to track down the real killer.(n)

programme.title: Gurudev
programme.desc: A police inspector and and his friend have grown up together, but the inspector's father works as the right-hand man of a crime boss who also happens to be the friend's father.(n)

programme.title: Josh
programme.desc: The sister (Aishwarya Rai) of a gang leader (Shahrukh Khan) falls for a member (Chandrachur Singh) of a rival group.(n)

programme.title: 102 Not Out
programme.desc: Dattatraya Vakharia is a 102-year-old man who wants to break the record of oldest living male. There's just one problem -- he must find a way to change the sad and grumpy demeanor of his 75-year-old son.(n)

programme.title: Golmaal: Fun Unlimited
programme.desc: Chaos strikes when aimless, indebted friends (Ajay Devgan, Arshad Warsi, Sharman Joshi) try to con a blind couple.(n)

programme.title: Dunno Y Na Jaane Kyun...
programme.desc: A secretly gay husband (Kapil Sharma) has an affair with a male prostitute while his neglected wife contemplates an affair with her brother-in-law.(n)

programme.title: Keemat
programme.desc: Ajay and Dev feel guilty after they accidentally kill a young man. When they visit the boy's family but cannot bring themselves to speak the truth, they decide to stay and make amends in secret.(n)

programme.title: Four Pillars Of Basement
programme.desc: Samir, a mall security officer, has a crush on Riya, who works at the mall. After his twin brother traps Riya in a basement, he must rescue her.(n)

programme.title: Sweekar Kiya Maine
programme.desc: Gopika Sharma is taken to Bombay by her uncle to help her pursue a career in singing; when he is abducted, Gopika and her servant must fend for themselves.(n)

programme.title: Loha
programme.desc: Mustafa becomes king of the underworld after he is overthrown by Lukka.(n)

programme.title: Kasoor
programme.desc: A lawyer (Lisa Ray) walks a dangerous line by falling in love with her client (Aftab Shivdasani), a wealthy man accused of murdering his wife.(n)

programme.title: Koyelaanchal
programme.desc: A thug is sent to intimidate a government official and accidentally kills his wife.(n)

programme.title: Jahan Tum Le Chalo
programme.desc: A journalist cum social activist and a photographer are in a relationship, but the latter refuses to marry her, until a good-looking young man falls in love with his girlfriend, making him feel insecure and jealous.(n)

programme.title: Luv Shuv Pyar Vyar
programme.desc: Rahul, a prizefighter who hails from a poor family, is smitten with Ruby, the daughter of a rich and powerful man. While their love blooms, her father opposes their union fiercely.(n)

programme.title: Hai Apna Dil Toh Awara
programme.desc: Three couples from Mumbai struggle to deal with the friction in their relationships. They start to understand each other better when they go for a holiday to Kashmir.(n)

programme.title: Aaj Ka Mahatma
programme.desc: When one twin is killed in prison, the other gets himself arrested to avenge his brother's death. Upon his release, he finds that his life -- and that of his girlfriend -- are in danger.(n)

programme.title: Krantiveer
programme.desc: A crusading journalist (Dimple Kapadia) inspires an aimless man (Nana Patekar) to fight for the rights of the poor.(n)

programme.title: Daraar
programme.desc: A hero comes to the aid of an Indian woman (Juhi Chawla) who rebels against a cruel, possessive husband (Arbaaz Khan).(n)

programme.title: Golmaal: Fun Unlimited
programme.desc: Chaos strikes when aimless, indebted friends (Ajay Devgan, Arshad Warsi, Sharman Joshi) try to con a blind couple.(n)

programme.title: Dastak
programme.desc: A police inspector (Mukul Dev) must protect Miss Universe (Sushmita Sen) from a dangerously unstable fan (Sharad Kapoor).(n)

programme.title: Khakee -The Real Police
programme.desc: A police detective's secret life is exposed when he steals drugs from a powerful drug lord.(n)

programme.title: Blue Oranges
programme.desc: Nilesh is investigating the murder of a rich alcoholic woman. He investigates a bunch of suspects, including the murdered woman's ex-lover, before concluding the truth.(n)

programme.title: Yeh Hai Judgement - Hang Till Death
programme.desc: Ashraf Ansari, a local resident of Mumbai, is taken into custody as a suspect for the bomb blast that shakes the entire city. He battles with the police and the corrupt system to prove his innocence.(n)

programme.title: Mrityudand
programme.desc: A couple try to break away from the corrupt influence of the men in their village.(n)

programme.title: Koyelaanchal
programme.desc: A thug is sent to intimidate a government official and accidentally kills his wife.(n)

programme.title: Khel
programme.desc: A wealthy widow loses her son in a car accident. Years later, she hires a young man who retrieves her purse from a thief. Impressed by his honesty, she hires him, but the guy is a con who is hatching a plan to seize her property.(n)

programme.title: Woh Lamhe
programme.desc: A filmmaker (Shiney Ahuja) finds romance with a troubled actress (Kangana Ranaut).(n)

programme.title: EMI: Liya Hai to Chukana Padega
programme.desc: The head of a collection agency uses shady tactics to collect money from those in default.(n)

programme.title: Tadipaar
programme.desc: Shankar rescues a woman and finds out that she resembles a millionaire, Mohinidevi, who has gone missing. Shankar comes up with a plan to get rich.(n)

programme.title: Anjaane: The Unknown
programme.desc: A married couple with 2 children, Tanwi Gouri Mehta and Anand Mehta. They are wealthy and live in a mansion. Their idyllic life is shattered with the arrival of Sonia, who has an affair with Adiyta.(n)

programme.title: Chor Bazaari-Ek Atrangi Prem Kahani
programme.desc: Sweeti uses Charlie for a psychology thesis and falls in love with him, but he rejects her. When he decides to move on with his life, his criminal past catches up.(n)

programme.title: Juaari
programme.desc: Vijay, a young man, resorts to gambling to free his lover, Shanti, whom Sanga holds captive, but he soon runs out of luck and gets arrested.(n)

programme.title: Chaar Din Ki Chandni
programme.desc: Veer's father is obsessed with finding him a Rajput bride. Therefore, Veer's girlfriend, Chandni, faces the challenge of winning the hearts of Veer's family during his sister's four-day wedding events.(n)

programme.title: Maa Beti
programme.desc: Savitri lives with her husband and daughter, Meenu. She gives birth to a son, Khetan, and tragically passes away. Release Year: 1986.(n)

programme.title: Dillagi
programme.desc: Unaware that his brother is in love with the girl he himself loves, Ranvir arranges for their wedding. Release Year: 1999.(n)

programme.title: Shaadi No. 1
programme.desc: Kothari has three daughters who shun the idea of arranged marriages. To make them realize, he wants three men to woo the ladies, and then ditch them. Release Year: 2005 Director: David Dhawan.(n)

programme.title: Ready
programme.desc: Prem in love with Sanjana whose uncles are behind her massive bank account. The story is about how they teach a lesson to her uncles. Release Year: 2011 Director: Anees Bazmee Awards: Star of the Year Male: Salman Khan Stardust Awards.(n)

programme.title: Baadshaho
programme.desc: An Indian queen Ileana D'Cruz asks her bodyguard Ajay Devgn to steal back gold taken from her by the Indian government during The Emergency period in 1975. Release Year: 2017 Director: Milan Luthria.(n)

programme.title: Stree
programme.desc: A town is held in the grip of terror by tales of a mysterious woman who calls men by their name and then abducts them, leaving their clothes behind.(n)

programme.title: Abhay
programme.desc: Vijay Kamal Hassan has a girlfriend Tejaswini Raveena Tandon. Abhay, Vijay's twin brother who is in jail feels that Tejaswini ruins Viay's life. Release Year: 2009 Director: Mahesh Babu.(n)

programme.desc: Satyabol, a devout Hindu, is against his daughter Shivani's relationship with Arjun, a Christian. Resultantly, Arjun asks his conniving cousin, Kishan, to help him unite with his lover.(n)
